data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schneider, Thomas, Ikemeyer, Dietmar, Ferreira, Sónia, Müller, Ole (2016): Rediscovery and redescription of Coenagrion persicum (Lohmann 1993) with description of the female, and some notes on habitat selection (Odonata: Coenagrionidae). Zootaxa 4103 (6): 561-573, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.6.6
